altTitles.en: Revenge Channel Uramin ~Livestreaming Public Executions~

altTitles.ja: 復讐チャンネル ウラミン ～公開処刑ナマ配信中～

description.en:
The online video site "Uramin TV" is a popular channel that distributes videos depicting punishment on harmful people and has over 3 million subscribers. 
Minori Yoshiura, also known as "Uramin", who runs this site, has enthusiastic followers, but in fact, she was bullied horribly when she was in elementary school and became a shut-in. She vows to take revenge on her bullying perpetrators and broadcasts her revenge videos live. The number one target is Takemura Kyouka, the ringleader of bullying who has pushed her to the depths of hell and is now living a carefree life!

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.en: You Have No Human Rights

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

title.en: Satsuriku no Kuindeddo – 7-nin no Onna Shikeishuu

altTitles.ja: Satsuriku no Queen Dead – Nananin no Onna Shikeishuu
殺戮のクインデッド -7人の女死刑囚-

altTitles.en: Seven Queens of Death

description.en: Deep Palace is a prison island that houses only death row inmates. A young girl, Akari, was kept in the "Deep Palace" for a certain purpose... One day, the death row inmates suddenly start killing each other! A battle royale called the “Killing” is taking place where prisoners can do whatever they want as they remain the last ones standing! In the face of this pandemonium, will Akari be able to safely survive the "Killing" and escape from the prison?!

title.en: Kimi to Sekai ga Owaru Hi ni

altTitles.en: Love You as the World Ends

altTitles.ja: 君と世界が終わる日に

description.en: On the day of his proposal, Hibiki Mamiya, a young man, is trapped in a tunnel collapse accident. When he narrowly escapes from the tunnel, the world has completely changed. A dilapidated cityscape, countless bodies, and the "living dead" wandering around the city... Amidst this abnormal situation, Hibiki desperately searches for his lover, but he is nowhere to be found. Will the few survivors survive together in this hopeless situation? The manga is based on the television drama, "Love You as the World Ends".

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

altTitles.en: Three Part Struggle
Three Way Scramble
Three-way Struggle

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

altTitles.ja: サンダー3

description.en: A trio of teenage boys taken straight from a classic retro-looking gag manga jump through dimensions to a hyper realistic modern sci-fi world Gantz-style in order to save one of the boy's little sister.

altTitles.ja: インゴシマ

description.en: The Yoshinomiya Municipal High School 2nd year students embarked on what they'd hoped was an educational trip with their friends and away from family but it was not meant to be… Their ship was hit by unexpected rough seas and crashed on a strange island! The surviving students are trying to understand what happened but soon they realize they are not alone on this island and the locals don't appear to be very friendly to strangers!!!
description.es-la: Los estudiantes de 2º de Bachillerato Municipal de Yoshinomiya se embarcaron en lo que esperaban que fuera un viaje educativo con sus amigos y lejos de la familia, pero no estaba destinado a ser así... ¡Su barco fue golpeado por un inesperado oleaje y se estrelló en una extraña isla! Los estudiantes supervivientes intentan entender lo que ha pasado pero pronto se dan cuenta de que no están solos en esta isla y ¡¡¡los lugareños no parecen ser muy amables con los extraños!!!

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Small Town hardship in Sengoku Era - An Agriculture Comic

altTitles.ja: 戦国小町苦労譚 農耕戯画

altTitles.zh: 战国小町苦劳谭-农耕戏画

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés d'un village à l'époque Sengoku - Une histoire agricole

description.en:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)  
Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
description.fr: Shizuko est une lycéenne ordinaire avec des intérêts extraordinaires : l'Histoire et l'agricutlure. Ces passions vont peut-être lui sauver la vie : projetée à la période Sengoku, elle se retrouve au service d'un seigneur excentrique et exigeant : le fameux Oda Nobunaga. Obsédé par l'idée d'unifier le pays en proie aux guerres intestines, il entend bien faire usage des étranges compétences de cette fille venue d'ailleurs. Shizuko parviendra-t-elle à gagner sa confiance ? Retournera-t-elle à son époque ?

title.en: Rise of the Kowtowing Girl ~Sacrificial Revenge Game~

altTitles.ja: 土下座少女の下剋上 ～生贄リベンジゲーム～

altTitles.en: The Ascendance of the Dogeza Girl ~Sacrifice Revenge Game~

description.en: In a mysterious school, there is a class where students with the lowest grades are sent, named the "isolated class". Akari, an ordinary female student, falls into the "isolated class" due to her friend's betrayal, where she is exposed to irrational senseless violence! However, she stands up to the members who dominate the class with an unyielding heart. At the same time, Akari joins forces with Yuto, another student who has fallen into the segregated class, and vows to climb out of this mess...

title.en: Konbini Baito no Gal ga Kininaru Kyaku to Chikazuku Hanashi

altTitles.ja-ro: Konbini Baito no Gyaru ga Kininaru Kyaku to Chikazuku Hanashi

altTitles.ja: コンビニバイトのギャルが気になる客と近づく話
コンビニではじまる恋の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Konbini de Hajimaru Koi no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Gyaru Working at a Convenience Store Who Gets Closer to a Customer She's Interested in
A Story About a Burgeoning Love at a Convenience Store

altTitles.ru: История о гяру-продавщице, сблизившейся с покупателем

altTitles.es-la: Harén del Fin del Mundo - Fantasía

altTitles.en: World's End Harem Fantasia

altTitles.ja: 終末のハーレム ファンタジア

description.en: It's year 998, and the world has been corrupted by darkness. The next head of the small border kingdom of Nagara, Ark, has feelings for his cousin, Aurelia, but a political marriage to the Crown Prince has separated them. In order to get her back, Ark desires immense power, but a mysterious dark elf, Rati, appears in front of him.  In exchange for a promise, she will give him "the power to rule the world." An erotic and dark fantasy begins!
description.ja: 聖暦998年。そこはまもなく終末を迎える闇に蝕まれた世界。辺境の小国ナーガラの次期当主・アルクは従姉のアウレリアと両想いだったが、皇太子との政略結婚のため引き離されてしまった。彼女を取り戻そうと強力な力を欲するアルクの前に現れた謎のダークエルフ・ラティ。ラティからある約束と引き換えに“この世を統べることができる力”を授けると告げられたアルクは――。エロティック＆ダークファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Es el año 998, y el mundo ha sido corrompido por la oscuridad. El próximo jefe del pequeño reino fronterizo de Nagara, Alk, siente algo por su prima Aurelia, pero un matrimonio político con el príncipe heredero los ha separado. Para recuperarla, Alk anhela un inmenso poder, pero la misteriosa elfa oscura Rati aparece ante él.  A cambio de una promesa, ella le dará "el poder de gobernar el mundo". ¡Comienza una fantasía erótica y oscura!

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

altTitles.en: Dogs Red

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

altTitles.en: Vengeful Lover
Revenge Lover

description.en: Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as an Aristocrat with an Appraisal Skill

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: The Fallen Hero and the Rikka Witches

altTitles.ja-ro: Ochikobore Yuusha to Rikka no Majo

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ勇者と六花の魔女

altTitles.en: The Fallen Hero and the Rikka Witches

description.en:
Shuu, a dropout at the Academy for the Brave, whose swordsmanship and magic skills have not developed, is finally advised by the headmaster to leave the academy!
Two beautiful witches suddenly appear before him and tell that he is the chosen one who has inherited the soul of the Demon King and that he needs to cooperate with the witches to unleash its mighty power.
Shuu quickly learns how to liberate himself, and for the first time in his life, he is able to use magic and successfully clears the final examinations that will prevent to be expelled from the academy! 
Shuu then decides to first become a hero with the power of the Demon King as a prerequisite for becoming the Demon King that the witches want--.
The boy demon king's school warrior fantasy begins!

altTitles.ja: シリアルキラー異世界に降り立つ

altTitles.en: The Serial Killer Descends Into Another World
The serial killer is reincarnated into the another world.

altTitles.es-la: Un asesino serial ha descendido a otro mundo

altTitles.de: Serienkiller in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert

description.de:
Ein Mörder, der den Drang, Menschen zu töten, nicht stoppen kann, obwohl er damit aufhören will, erhält das von ihm gewünschte Todesurteil.
Seine Freude ist nur von kurzer Dauer, denn er wird in einer anderen Welt reinkarniert. Der Auftrag, den ihm die Göttin erteilt hat, besteht darin, 12 reinkarnierte Menschen mit seinen mörderischen Impulsen zu töten.
Nicht alle reinkarnierten Menschen sind Heilige!
description.en:
A murderer who cannot stop the urge to kill people, even though he wants to stop, receives the death sentence he wants.
His joy is short-lived, as he is reincarnated in another world. The mission entrusted to him by the goddess is to kill 12 reincarnated people using his murderous impulses.
Not all reincarnated people are saints!

altTitles.en: Tokyo: Four Seasons

altTitles.ja: 東京 ─四季─

description.en:
**Volume 1**

_As for the tutoring fee, you can pay me with sex._

Saotome Kyouhei, a Rōnin student, runs into Jinguuji Yuito—a classmate of his, who got into the university he had failed to get into, with the highest score.
Born into a strict family where everyone is accomplished, Kyouhei was raised to become a model student, but he finds himself backed into a corner after facing his first setback, namely, failing to get admitted into university.
Jinguuji approaches Kyouhei offering to become his private tutor in exchange for sex.
Although he dislikes it, Kyouhei gets completely caught up in Jinguuji's sadistic acts as he grows extremely obsessed with Kyouhei…

A love story spanning four seasons in Tokyo, including, Autumn, Winter, and Summer.

**Volume 2**

_It'd be in our best interests to not know anything about each other.
It will become a mess otherwise._

On a sweltering summer night, the star of his advertising agency, Yagami, starts a no-strings-attached relationship with a certain man he met at a gay bar.
The man was easy on the eyes and wore a suit despite it being the middle of summer which screamed elite. Yet, he was inexperienced, a virgin through and through.
Yagami didn't even know his name—their relationship was purely physical.
Besides the sex, dragging in anything else was forbidden—that was their relationship, and that's how it was supposed to be... The man had courage and respected Yagami's boundaries, but before he knew it, Yagami began to catch feelings for him.

Yagami had never intended to get serious. That was how things were supposed to be...??

A love story spanning four seasons in Tokyo, Summer.
Also includes 'Spring' - a story of Kazuma and Ren from Tokyo in April!

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

altTitles.en: Tokimori-san Is Completely Defenseless!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！

title.en: Ano Oni Kyoushi ga Boku no Ane ni Narundesuka?

altTitles.id: Guru Killer Itu Akan Menjadi Kakak Perempuanku?

altTitles.en: Is that demon teacher my sister?
That Demonic Teacher Will Be My Sister?

altTitles.ja: あの鬼教師が僕の姉になるんですか？

description.en: A boy is initially overjoyed at the news of him having an older sister, due to his father remarrying to a woman who has a daughter. That is, until he finds out that his new sister is actually his school's strict PE teacher, Shina. With his father going off to live with his new wife, the boy will live alone with his new sister. In their new life together, the boy finds out that Shina at home is completely different from Shina at work: clumsy, scared of insects, and kind.
description.id: Seorang anak laki-laki awalnya sangat gembira mendengar kabar bahwa dia akan memiliki seorang kakak perempuan karena ayahnya menikah lagi dengan seorang wanita yang memiliki seorang anak perempuan. Namun, kegembiraanya itu terhenti saat dia mengetahui bahwa saudara perempuan barunya itu adalah guru olahraga sekolahnya yang super ketat, Shiina. Dikarenakan Ayahnya pergi berbulan madu bersama istri barunya, anak laki-laki tersebut akan tinggal berdua saja dengan saudara perempuan barunya itu. Dalam kehidupan bersama baru mereka, si anak laki-laki tersebut mengetahui bahwa Shiina di rumah sangatlah berbeda dengan Shiina saat di tempat bekerja; canggung, takut pada serangga, dan baik hati.
description.pt-br: A história acompanha um rapaz que inicialmente fica muito feliz com a notícia de ter uma irmã mais velha devido ao seu pai se casar novamente com uma mulher que já tem uma filha, até que ele descobre que a sua nova irmã é na realidade a sua estrita professora de educação física da sua escola, Shina. Com o pai saindo de casa para morar com a sua nova esposa, o rapaz vai morar sozinho com a sua nova irmã. Na sua nova vida juntos, o rapaz descobre que Shina no trabalho é completamente diferente da Shina em casa: desajeitada, com medo de insetos e gentil.

altTitles.en: Queen's Palace

description.en: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Transmigrated Somewhere
It Seems I've Transmigrated Somewhere
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

altTitles.ja: はっちぽっちぱんち,

altTitles.en: Hotch Potch Punch

description.en:
She was destroying people… in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone." As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint…? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!

description.en:
Though Chichi the cat looks very cute, she has one goal: eradicate humanity and take over the world! She decides to recruit comrades to aid her in her quest, but it looks like world conquest won't be that easy?! 

Follow the adventures of Chichi the tyrant, Dunno the doggo who loves humans, and Kaiser Kang Taeshik, the hard-boiled wild hamster, as they face many hardships on their path to absolute dominion!

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん
ヤンキー娘

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.zh-hk: 請你回去吧！阿久津同學

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.en: Please Go Home, Akutsu-san!
Please Go Home! Akutsu-san

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en: Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t? A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: School Infirmary Nurse That Wants to Teach Adult Stuff

altTitles.ja: 筆下ろしたい保健室の先生

altTitles.en: Infirmary Teacher Who Wants to Have a Playmate
School Nurse Who Wants to Take a Younger Student’s Virginity

altTitles.vi: Cô giáo ở phòng y tế muốn động thủ

altTitles.ja: 凍堂くんちのメイドショタ

altTitles.en: Mister Toudou's Little Boy Maid

description.en:
Rennosuke, a scion of the influential Toudou Group, has a terrible relationship with his family. He spends his days getting told off by his father and older sister, who say things like "Did you get into a fight again?" "Having a delinquent for a son of the Toudou family is an embarrassment". 
One day, Rennosuke chances upon a hungry child. The sight of that child hungrily devouring a piece of bread reminds Rennosuke of the dog he once owned, and he asks half-jokingly "If you don't have anywhere to go, why don't you come to my place?".  The child then comes to the Toudou house and starts working as a maid.

Min Jung Woo uses his ability to spot unfortunate events and tries to stop them, which leads to him becoming a terrorist feared by the people.


---
description.fr:
Min Jung Woo a une capacité spéciale, une capacité qui lui permet de savoir quelle route mène au malheur. Min Jung Woo utilise ses yeux du « malheur » pour repérer les catastrophes et pour essayer de les empêcher, le menant ainsi sur le devant de la scène en tant que terroriste craint par tout le monde.


---

altTitles.en: Rear-End Collision

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

altTitles.ja: 深潭回廊

altTitles.en: Hallway to the Abyss

description.en:
He was a teacher who knew his student was gay and still desired his body.
After running away from everything, he became a wanderer and took the name Mos-san.

Yanagida struggled with the pain of being in love with the same sex. 
He committed attempted rape on a student when he was a teacher, and ran away from there. 
Before he knew it he had become Mos, a pitiful demon who had thrown his past away, but had no choice but to keep on living. 
He thought he'd lost everything but a single boy reached out his hand to him.

Seven years have passed since the painful but passionate story of 'Smells Like Green Spirit.'

Cha Gunmu' , who infiltrates the after-party of L Company's shareholders' meeting to find clues about Red Diamond, encounters 'Yeon Taeoh', the youngest son of the Yeonsun Group and a genius racer. While chasing the target, Gunmu witnesses Taeoh drinking alcohol laced with drugs, and ends up saving him and missing the target. In the hotel where the drugged Teoh was laid to rest, something strange happened to the drugged Taeoh...? “Why don’t you bear all your responsibilities to the end?” Gunmu, who was helplessly caught up in Taeoh’s actions, leaves the hotel room disgusted by his arrogant attitude and vows never to see him again, but he hears that his target, Red Diamond, is related to the Yeonseon Group... “This debt will be properly repaid later.” Would this be just a moment of burning pleasure or a tenacious and brutal relationship?

altTitles.ja: ブラッドナイトマーケット

description.en:
Blood Night Street is a town where vampires seeking blood and humans seeking blood buyers gather.
Su Tie, a human who has been branded as an "abolished blood", works for the Blood Control Bureau, an organisation that controls the illegal activities of vampires. One day, Su-Tetsu meets a mysterious vampire, Hyakutori, who claims to be a gastronomist in the city.
A battle suspense of courtship and redemption, spun by a destiny etched in blood, begins.

altTitles.ja: マリッジグレー

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!?　自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！　一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?　相思相愛な新婚夫婦の、激甘かけ違いラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

altTitles.en: Roxana: The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother
The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother
How to Protect the Heroine's Older Brother

altTitles.vi: Cách để bảo vệ anh trai của Nữ chính

altTitles.es: Cómo proteger al hermano mayor de la heroína

altTitles.ru: Как защитить старшего брата главной героини

altTitles.fa: راهی برای نجات برادر بزرگ‌ترِ شخصیت اولِ زن

altTitles.ja: ロクサナ〜悪女がヒロインの兄を守る方法〜

altTitles.zh: 保护女主角哥哥的方法

altTitles.zh-hk: 保護女主角哥哥的方法

description.en:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

**Links:**
- [Official Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
- [Official Japanese/日本語 Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.fr:
Enlèvements, meurtres, et relations risquées! Dans les pages scandaleuses de *La fleur abyssale*, la chute de la famille criminelle de Roxana Agrece est déjà annoncée. Ainsi, lorsque Cassis Pedelian, le frère aîné de l'héroïne, est kidnappé par le père de Roxana, elle peut soit attendre la vengeance de l'héroïne... soit prendre les choses en main, puisque Cassis est la clé de sa survie. Mais avec des personnages trompeurs de tous les côtés, Roxana et Cassis peuvent-ils se faire suffisamment confiance pour faire tomber les brutales Agrece?

---
Traductions officielles:
* [Anglais / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Indonésien / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Japonais / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.id:
Aku tidak sengaja merasuki seseorang dalam novel harem terbalik 19+.  Masalahnya adalah aku menjadi Roxana Agriche, kakak dari sub-penjahat itu. Ayahku menculik saudara pemeran utama wanita itu. Sekarang, apakah satu-satunya hal yang tersisa untuk menemui akhir yang mengerikan dari pembalasan pemeran utama wanita? Tetapi bagaimana jika aku dapat menghindari perkembangan yang mengerikan itu?  “Aku juga tertarik dengan mainan ini.”  "Aku akan melindungimu sampai kamu bisa keluar dari sini dengan selamat."

---
Official Translations:
* [Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Bahasa Inggris / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Bahasa Jepang / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.it:
Accidentalmente mi sono reincarnata in un personaggio in un romanzo di harem inverso per maggiorenni. Il problema è che sono diventata Roxana Agriche, la sorella maggiore del cattivo. Il mio dannato padre ha poi rapito il fratello dell'eroina. Ora cosa ci rimane per incontrare una fine terribile e la vendetta dell'eroina? Ma cosa dovrei fare per evitare quest'orribile sviluppo? "Anche io sono interessata a questo giocattolo." "Ti proteggerò, finché non potrai uscire di qui sano e salvo." Il fratello dell'eroina, Cassis Fedelian, potrà sicuramente ripagarmi più tardi.

---
Official Translations:
* [Giapponese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [Indonesiano / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Inglese / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
description.ja:
どういう訳か小説の中の悪の一族、アグリチェ一家の娘「ロクサナ」に生まれ変わっていた！ アグリチェは人殺しをものともしない残虐非道な一族で、ロクサナもまたその一族の一人。 そして物語は、ロクサナの父「ラント」がある男を拉致してきた場面から始まる。 その拉致されてきた男は、アグリチェ一族とは対極のぺデリアン一族のプリンス「カシス」だった。 アグリチェ一族の誰もがカシスを殺そうとする中、ロクサナだけは唯一家族を騙してでも必死に救おうとする。 最初はロクサナを警戒していたカシスも徐々に心を開き始め…。

---
Official Translations:
* [日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [英語 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [インドネシア語 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
description.ko:
어쩌다 보니 19금 역하렘 소설에 빙의했다.

문제는 내가 악역 서브남의 누나가 되었다는 건데... 망할 아버지가 기어이 여자 주인공의 오빠를 납치해 왔다. 이제 여주인공의 가문에 복수 당해 몰락할 일만 남은 건가. 아아, 데드 플래그 피하기 진짜 힘들다.

"이번 장난감에는 저도 흥미가 있어요."

오빠, 이렇게 된 이상 내가 지켜줄게요.

그러니까 이 은혜는 나중에 꼭 갚아요, 알았죠?

---
Official Translations:
* [영어 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [인도네시아어 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [일본어 / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.ru:
Я переродилась в новелле 19+ с реверс-гаремом.

Проблема в том, что я стала старшей сестрой второго, злого главного героя… Мой чертов отец в конце концов похитил старшего брата главной героини. Теперь осталось только дожидаться мести от главной героини и разрушения рода? Ах, избежать смертельной концовки и правда тяжело.

"Я тоже заинтересована в этой игрушке."

Раз уж так вышло, то я тебя защищу. Поэтому обязательно отплати мне той же монетой, понял?

---
Official Translations:
* [Английский / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Индонезийский / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Японский / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.tr:
Bir 19+ ters harem romanının içine girdim.

Sorun şu ki, kötü adamın ablası Roxana Agriche oldum. Lanet babam, kahramanın kardeşini kaçırdı. Şimdi, kahramanın intikamından dolayı korkunç bir sonla karşılaşmak geriye kalan tek şey mi?

Ama ya bu korkunç gelişmeden kaçınırsam?

“Buradan sağ salim çıkana kadar seni koruyacağım.”

Kahramanın kardeşi Cassis Pedalian kesinlikle onun için yaptıklarımı daha sonra geri ödeyecek.

---
Official Translations:
* [Endonezce / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [İngilizce / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Japonca / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.pt-br:
Eu acidentalmente possui alguém em uma novel de harém reverso +19.
O problema é que eu me tornei Roxana Agriche, a irmã mais nova do sub-vilão. Meu maldito pai sequestrou o irmão da heroína.
Agora, a única coisa que me resta é encontrar um final terrível da vingança da heroína?
Mas e se eu puder evitar esse acontecimento?
“Eu também estou interessada nesse brinquedo.”
“Eu vou protegê-lo até que possa sair daqui a salvo.”
O irmão da heroína, Cassis Pedalian, vai definitivamente conseguir me retribuir depois.

---

ファ美肉

altTitles.ru: Фантастический мир с обращённым в красавицу мужчиной и…

altTitles.en: With a Fogie Reincarnated as a Pretty Fantasy Girl
Life with an Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated into a Total Fantasy Knockout

description.en:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However… will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!
description.ru: Скучный мужчина вместе с его красивым лучшим другом были призваны в другой мир обнаженной богиней! Однако из-за озорства богини одного превратили в... невероятно красивую девушку?! Чтобы обратно вернуть своё тело, они должны отправиться в путешествие, чтобы победить Короля Демонов!! Да пускай начнётся романтическая комедия, наполненная полным безумием иного мира!
description.pt-br:
Hinata Tachibana, um trabalhador de escritório sitiado de 32 anos, e seu belo melhor amigo Tsukasa Jinguuji foram convocados para outro mundo por uma deusa nua. No entanto, por causa das travessuras da deusa, Tachibana foi transformada em uma garota bonita inigualável ?! Para recuperar seu corpo, ele tem que viajar com seu melhor amigo para derrotar o rei demônio !! 

No entanto... eles serão capazes de manter as mãos longe um do outro !? 

"Um homem mais velho que se tornou uma garota bonita" e "Um homem mais velho e bonito"! Deixe a loucura outra jornada mundial rom-com começar!!

altTitles.ja: アシガール

description.en:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

altTitles.ja: 甘くなるまで待てません

altTitles.en: I Can't Hold Out Until It's Sweet Enough

description.en: The main character of the story is Asakura Mei a 24-year-old who works as an office worker. Mei, who had just received a proposal from her boyfriend, was worried at the same time when her brother asked her to take over the Japanese sweets shop at her parents' house and become president. What appeared in front of such a bud was a gentle young man who called himself Higashi... A romantic comedy by a friendly female president and a sadistic boy is developed.

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と×××

title.en: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Ore no Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: Oreyome
Kono Naka ni 1-ri, Ore no Yome ga Iru
この中に1人、俺の嫁がいる

altTitles.en: One of them is my wife

description.en:
For the sake of finding clues about his younger twin brother who suddenly went missing, the protagonist changed his identity and infiltrated the academy his brother was attending.

However, what clearly came to light there was a surprising truth! His brother had multiple fiancées...?

(Source: Ganma)
description.id: Souya seorang laki-laki yang menggantikan posisi adiknya yang tiba-tiba menghilang, Terlebih lagi dia menemukan fakta yang mengejutkan bahwa adiknya memiliki banyak tunangan?
description.ja: 突如失踪した双子の弟の手がかりを得る為、入れ替わって学園に潜入することになった主人公。 しかし、そこで明らかになるのは驚愕の事実！ 弟には複数人の婚約者が居て……？

altTitles.ja: ロボットの心（パーツ）

altTitles.en: Robot's Heart (Parts)

description.en: Received an honorable mention at the 47th Shinman Award for his first submission work "shisa-sha  Tenma Jigoku". The one-shot "Hanasaki Dai Circus" published in the YJ Battle 2 special edition at Tonari no Young Jump is being serializeded.

altTitles.en: A Second Away from a Kiss
One seconds remaining until the kiss
キスまで、あと1秒

description.en: Izuru said he'd stop one second before he kissed Rikka… So why are they really kissing right now!? Rikka's first kiss is on stage performing a play…! Rikka and Izuru have been friends since they were kids. Izuru's always bossing Rikka around. Rikka has to write the script for their school festival play, which is a relief because at least she can steer clear of Izuru, who's playing the leading role of the prince… But on performance day, the princess gets sick, and Rikka has to take her place! She's dreading the final kissing scene. They're just supposed to pretend, but now… their lips are… touching…! She knows it's Izuru… but he looks like a handsome prince, and… he's actually kinda hot…

altTitles.ja: 搾り取らないで、女商人さん

altTitles.en: Please Don’t Milk Me, Merchant-san!!

description.en:
Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There, adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros, but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant, Philo the Beastkin, is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. 

What will become of Lavi’s adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!   

This is a fantasy comic with a teasing merchant!!
description.es:
el Misterioso laberinto subterráneo gigante "Tartaros".   
  
Allí, los aventureros de día y de noche se aventuran en  
buscan tesoros y otras riquezas. El aventurero novato Lavi (shota) que desafió el calabozo "tartaros" y que para su mala suerte se mete en algunos problemas, Es en ese instante cuando conoció a la mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu), con quien hace un trato para ser su cliente habitual.  
¿Qué pasará con la aventura de Lavi? ¡seguirá Comprándole ítem   
a esta belleza y hermosa!  
  
¡¡¡la comedia de fantasía sobre el aventurero novato Lavi (shota)   
y la comerciante mitad bestia Philo (ponkotsu)!!

title.en: My Sweet Enemy, Thy Name Is Husband

altTitles.pt-br: Casamento Político com um Inimigo Amigável

altTitles.pl: Mój słodki wróg ma imię mojego męża

altTitles.en: Forced Into Wedlock With An Affectionate Enemy
Political Marriage With a Friendly Enemy

description.en:
My husband, my nemesis. Till death do us part.

Canach Riadon — a slave who rose to become the emperor and the man I wed in my first life. Yet our ill-fated marriage left my family murdered and my homeland destroyed at his hands. Now given a second chance, I vow to succeed in this political marriage and save all I love... Or will his love save me first?
description.pl: Canach Riadon - niewolnik, który został cesarzem i mężczyzna, którego poślubiłam w moim pierwszym życiu. Jednak nasze niefortunne małżeństwo sprawiło, że moja rodzina została zamordowana, a moja ojczyzna zniszczona z jego rąk. Teraz, mając drugą szansę, przysięgam odnieść sukces w tym politycznym małżeństwie i ocalić wszystko, co kocham... A może najpierw jego miłość ocali mnie?
description.pt-br:
Meu marido, meu inimigo. Até que a morte nos separe.
Canach Riadon — um escravo que se tornou o Imperador e o homem com quem eu casei em minha primeira vida. Entretanto, nosso casamento mal-fadado resultou na morte da minha família e na destruição da minha terra natal causada por suas mãos. Agora que recebi uma segunda chance, eu juro ser bem sucedida neste casamento político e salvar tudo o que amo... Ou o amor dele me salvará primeiro?

title.en: I Don't Want to Attack You!

description.en:
On the way home, a drunk Heather helps an elephant who is crying because his nose hurts. When a small, palm-sized elephant is turned into a nose cuff, the elephant claims to be the god of sexual desire and affection.

"In exchange, I will let you share passionate love with the most handsome man on the continent."

However, this was not a blessing from God, but a curse.
description.pt-br:
No caminho para casa, Heather bêbada ajuda um elefante que está chorando porque seu nariz dói. Quando um pequeno elefante do tamanho da palma da mão é transformado em uma algema para o nariz, o elefante afirma ser o deus do desejo sexual e do afeto.

“Em troca, deixarei você compartilhar um amor apaixonado com o homem mais bonito do continente.”

No entanto, isso não foi uma bênção de Deus, mas uma maldição.

title.en: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins

description.en:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
description.ko:
전생엔 초등교사, 현생엔 가정교사.
인생 2회 차인 세라 포포는 전생의 경험을 살려
귀족 자제들을 대상으로 고액 가정교사 일을 하는 중이었다.
목표는 건물주!

그러던 어느 날,
제국의 황제가 찾아왔다.

“포포 양께서 제 동생들의 가정교사를 맡아주면 좋겠어요.”

물 폭탄, 밀가루 폭탄, 벌레 공격 등
온갖 악질 장난은 다 한다고 악명이 자자한 쌍둥이 전하들의
가정교사가 되어 달라는 무시무시한 제안을 하기 위해!

달콤하기 짝이 없는 고액을 곁들인,
그 악마의 제안이 세라의 인생을 뒤흔들었다.

#환생물 #육아물
#전생도 현생도 교사 여주
#육아지옥에 빠진 황제 남주

title.en: A Marriage Contract with Two Husbands

description.en:
Roselaine married Grand Duke Melchior, the best knight in the Empire. He said it’s because, “I want to save you.” Roselaine can only respond, “You don’t know anything about me.”

A man who wants to save her life, save her family, pay off her debts, and even marry her? They say there’s no such thing as a favor without any strings attached, so why would he go this far for someone he doesn’t even know?

“Because you look like someone I knew.” Roselaine evidently looks just like Melchior’s first love.

While depressed because she thinks she is only a stand-in for his first love, Roselaine takes in Julian, who looks exactly like her husband’s childhood self, as her disciple. But then Julien asks, “Please divorce him and marry me, Roselaine.”

What happens if she marries both men?
